title: NFL ATL: Week 12 recap
itunes:title: NFL ATL: Week 12 recap
description:
A room full of heroes, Gregg Rosenthal, Dan Hanzus and Marc Sessler recap all of the Week 12 action including the “Sunday Night Football” matchup between the Denver Broncos and the New England Patriots. Don’t miss the key takeaways and analysis from each game. The gang also gives fellow hero Chris Wesseling a surprise call. Join the conversation on Twitter: @NFL_ATL or #NFLATL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
